C

calcBill() - Method in interface payments.Billing
This method is used to calculate the bill based on service.
calcBill() - Method in class payments.PostpaidService
This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
This method calculates total cost for all calls and any additional data used.
calcBill() - Method in class payments.PrepaidService
This method will calculate the bill for the call duration.
Call - Class in payments
This class contains the details of a call placed by an account with a connection.
Call(String, String, String, Tarrif) - Constructor for class payments.Call
An all argument constructor that initializes all the instance variables of this class.
call - Variable in class payments.PrepaidService
An attribute of type Call
calls - Variable in class payments.PostpaidService
An ArrayList attribute of Type Call, which contains all calls placed by a customer.
callType - Variable in class payments.Call
An attribute of type Tarrif that stores the type of call.
canMakeCall() - Method in class payments.MobileService
This method overrides the abstract method declared in Operations interface.
canMakeCall() - Method in interface payments.Operations
The method is used to check whether the customer can make a call.
canMakeCall() - Method in class payments.PostpaidService
This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
As postpaid customers do not have attribute balance to place a call, return true
canMakeCall() - Method in class payments.PrepaidService
This method overrides the abstract method declared in super class.
This method returns true if balance is greater that 0
ConnectionAccount - Class in accounts
This class contains all details about customer.
ConnectionAccount(String, String, String) - Constructor for class accounts.ConnectionAccount
Three argument constructor initializes the instance variables.
ConnectionAccount(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class accounts.ConnectionAccount
Four argument constructor initializes the instance variables.
connectionType - Variable in class accounts.ConnectionAccount
An attribute that stores type of connection.
customerName - Variable in class accounts.ConnectionAccount
Full name of the customer.
Ex:Roger Federer
